title: game start issues
body:
3 time after we pick champions the game frozen  on legacy Client 
and when i start the beta client i i cant start the game ( Find match ) 
and i got ( ATTEMPT TO JOIN QUEUE FAILED ) 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
After champion select ends and you go into the loading screen, your network needs to make a new connection to a certain game server where you will be playing. It seems like your network is stable enough to get into the champion select screen, but it might be having a hard time connecting to the specific server that your game will be played on. 

Look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check for any network instabilities there. Hit me back up if you're still having problems getting past champion select!
